sentence_zh_TW: 為了慶祝她的生日，我們準備了一個豐盛的蛋糕來分享給所有的客人。
sentence: To celebrate her birthday, we prepared a delicious ______ to share with all the guests.

sentence_zh_TW: 明天的聚會上，請帶來一些你最喜歡的遊戲來讓每個人都開心。
sentence: Please ______ some of your favorite games to the gathering tomorrow to entertain everyone.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們需要一些額外的時間來完成這個計畫，因為事情變得比較複雜。
sentence: We need ______ extra time to complete the project because things have gotten a little more complicated.

sentence_zh_TW: 在婚禮上，所有的朋友和家人將一起慶祝新人的幸福時刻。
sentence: At the wedding, all the friends and family will celebrate the happy moment of the newlyweds ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 那個城市的年度節日吸引了成千上萬的遊客來參加多樣的活動。
sentence: The annual ______ in that city attracts thousands of visitors to participate in various activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次家庭聚會中，我們分享了一頓豐盛的餐，讓每個人都滿足。
sentence: At the family gathering, we shared a delicious ______ that left everyone satisfied.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了這次旅行，我們需要制定詳細的計畫，包括所有的活動和路線。
sentence: For this trip, we need to create a detailed ______ that includes all the activities and routes.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你同意這個提議，請點頭或說一句簡單的好的以表達你的同意。
sentence: If you agree to this proposal, please nod or say a simple '______' to show your agreement.

sentence_zh_TW: 有時候，人們會因為愚蠢的錯誤而感到沮喪，但這是學習的一部分。
sentence: Sometimes people feel frustrated because of ______ mistakes, but it's part of the learning process.

sentence_zh_TW: 在音樂會上，鼓手熱情地擊打鼓，渲染出整個音樂的氛圍。
sentence: At the concert, the drummer passionately hit the ______ to enhance the atmosphere of the music.

sentence_zh_TW: 他們在聚會上分享了一部有趣的影片，讓所有的觀眾都笑了。
sentence: They shared a funny ______ at the gathering that made all the viewers laugh.

sentence_zh_TW: 這棵樹是花園裡最高的，以至於能夠遮擋住陽光。
sentence: This tree is the ______est in the garden, so it can block out the sunlight.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個遊戲有不同的水平，讓玩家可以挑戰自己並提升技能。
sentence: This game has different ______s that allow players to challenge themselves and improve their skills.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次活動期間，所有參加者都可以享受有趣的遊戲和娛樂。
sentence: All participants can enjoy fun games and entertainment ______ the event.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行這個決定之前，我們必須確保所有的資訊都是正確的。
sentence: We must make ______ that all the information is accurate before making this decision.

sentence_zh_TW: 在公園裡，許多樹提供了遮蔭，讓遊客們能夠避開烈日的曝曬。
sentence: In the park, many ______s provide shade, allowing visitors to escape the scorching sun.

sentence_zh_TW: 在雨天，孩子們通常會待在室內，玩一些室內遊戲來消磨時間。
sentence: On ______ days, children usually stay indoors to play some games to pass the time.

sentence_zh_TW: 在聚會結束之後，我們會一起整理並清理所有的物品。
sentence: We will clean up and organize all items together ______ the party ends.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這棟建築的上方，有一個巨大的廣告牌，吸引了過路者的注意。
sentence: There is a giant billboard ______ the building that attracts the attention of passersby.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書詳盡地介紹了整個國家的歷史，讓讀者了解過去的事件與文化。
sentence: This book provides a detailed overview of the country's ______, helping readers understand past events and culture.
